title: Help Me Choose A Skin!
body:
I have always wanted a {{champion:37}}  skin (I like to get 1 skin per champion).
However, I just cannot choose which skin I want to get (when it's 50% off).

Which skin is the best? Provide your reasoning.

- Default skin.
- Guqin.
- Arcade.
- DJ.

replies.body: Arcade is best value for money
dj is a scam but its visually the best so you may as well grab it if its on sale

> [{quoted}](name=Pured,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=O1iYJb0z,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-03-22T23:35:33.009+0000)
>
> I have always wanted a {{champion:37}}  skin (I like to get 1 skin per champion).
> However, I just cannot choose which skin I want to get (when it&#039;s 50% off).
> 
> Which skin is the best? Provide your reasoning.
> 
> - Default skin.
> - Guqin.
> - Arcade.
> - DJ.

Go with DJ soma because it comes wihpth music.
arcade is on sale, like cheesyleeks said. but i think that dj is the best sona skin. ~~i'm that sad person who has pentakill sona~~
